title: Rachel Kushner Reads Thom Jones
description: Rachel Kushner joins Deborah Treisman to read and discuss Thom Jones’s “The Black Lights,” from a 1992 issue of the magazine.
content:encoded: Rachel Kushner reads and discusses “The Black Lights,” by Thom Jones.
